title: [K-12] Workshop on Statistical Reasoning for Understanding p-Values

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Concepts (Mean, Standard Deviation) and Understanding of Hypothesis Testing Procedures
context.additional_context: Learners access simulation tools via personal devices (laptops, tablets) and conduct real-case analysis projects through group collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concept of p-values (significance level, power) with over 80% accuracy using computer simulations.
Learners can analyze real scientific experimental data applying hypothetical probabilistic reasoning and describe the p-value calculation process.
Learners can interpret p-value results in multiple ways using graphs, tables, and natural language explanations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
